General_Description: '''Helios's Greeting''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''I lie within the shadows beneath [[Makedonia]]'s lake, wading in her shallows, awaiting light's first break. When [[Helios]] beams through the arch in greeting, I am revealed and meet him, be it ever so fleeting.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the treasure.
